criminalDefense.name: DUI Defense
criminalDefense.summary: Strategic defense focused on protecting your license, livelihood, and future.

faqs.q: How fast do I need to act after a DUI arrest in Illinois?
faqs.a: Immediately. License-related timelines can move quickly, and early counsel helps preserve options.

faqs.q: Can I drive while my DUI case is pending?
faqs.a: It depends on your license status and court/administrative requirements. A lawyer can explain eligibility and next steps.
